section.31: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Qatadah narrated with his chain of narrators. The Prophet (ï·º) said:If anyone emancipates his share in a slave, he emancipates him (completely) by his property if he has property. The narrator Ibn al-Muthanna did not mention al-Nadr b. Anas. This is the version of Ibn Suwaid
